in the camp, watching them.
 I wasn't even put up for a duel. I didn't even get a chance to play.

en: Ouais.

C'est la déception aujourd'hui qui parle. Écoute…

And right from the start, you've never given up.
 I'm personally telling you, your decision to come back down

and give up power was gutsy.
 I can tell you that you should be proud of yourself.

en: Merci.

They're the ones who later had the most regrets.
 Because they gave up, and deep down, they know that,

pa:
Stay here. You have less than 24 hours to go.
 It's the last night, and tomorrow you'll thank me
vi:
Đêm cuối cùng.
 Mai bạn sẽ cảm ơn tôi vì đã bảo bạn ở lại.

en: Bref.
pa:
for convincing you to stay.
 Whatever.

en: vous aurez des choix à faire.

en: Courage.
pa: Stay strong.

vi:
và không thể đợi đến mai
 để biết chúng tôi sẽ có loại quyền lực nào với trận chung kết.

en: on va pouvoir avoir sur la finale.
pa:
I can't wait for tomorrow to find out
 what kind of power we'll have over the final.

en: On est très très bons.
pa: We're in a really great place.
vi: Ta đang ở nơi rất tuyệt.

en: Ça va exploser au camp, là. Elles doivent être vénères, les deux.

vi: Mọi thứ sẽ nổ tung ở trại. Chết tiệt, chắc họ giận lắm.

en: Ah ouais.
pa: Yeah.

en: Ah putain.
pa: Ah, damn.

en: Ah là là.

en: Putain.

Il pique pas grand-monde, donc ça va.

pa: You've played well because, you know,

we made such a big deal about the fact that we were an alliance.
 So naturally, we kind of pushed everyone else…

bọn tôi làm to chuyện mình là một liên minh
 đến mức bọn tôi tự nhiên đẩy những người khác lại với nhau.

Basically everyone.
 If we'd been really focused on strategy, extremely focused,

en: normal, vous êtes heureux, vous vous voyez,

en: vous pouvez pas faire semblant. Je comprends.

en: - Impossible. - C'est clair.
vi: - Không thể. - Chắc rồi.

vi: Khi lùi lại xem những gì mình đã làm,

en: Ouais.

- C'est vrai ? - Après, c'est le jeu.

I thought to myself,
 "Damn, you can really learn a lot about trust in this game."

-That's how it is in the end. -Yeah.
 We made our choices, and those choices led us to where we are now.
vi: Ta đã lựa chọn và chúng đưa ta đến vị trí hiện tại.

en: Moi, j'ai passé une nuit sur deux semaines dans cette putain de villa.
pa: In two weeks, I spent one night in that fucking villa.

en: Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est pourrir sur ce camp.

en: On m'a même pas laissé ma chance de jouer. Ça a montré que c'est vraiment des rats.
pa:
I didn't get a chance to really play, because they're all assholes.
 All of them.
vi: Tôi còn không được trao cơ hội để chơi. Nó cho thấy họ đúng là cặn bã.

pa: "The camp will decide the two finalists tomorrow."

Of course.
 "And the adventure isn't quite over for you yet."

Ça s'arrête là ?

Thibault is gone.
 With everything he's put me through in this game,

I'll show him the door myself.
 I'm gonna make him sweat… like he made us sweat.

and who you are the closest to.
 Okay, so in your mind, who deserves it most?
